DOC.brief_summary: This study assess association depression symptom iron metabolism patient undergoing hemodialysis .
DOC.brief_title: Association Between Depression Iron Metabolism Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) , second version , use quantify level depression . Mean age , duration HD , hemoglobin level , serum ferritin level , serum iron level , TSAT , TIBC , serum albumin level , CRP energy consumption ( kcal/week ) include model multivariate variable . Backward stepwise logistic regression ( ROC ) analysis perform .
DOC.criteria: Patients stable undergoing hemodialysis Patients refuse join present study , could complete questionnaire , patient chronic hepatitis B C exclude .
